OOC: Sorry


Blacknightmare looked to Perseus and said "I just ask you that=
 no body knows that I'm alive... Nobody will be safe if Unicron knows it"

=

  From: Kraftlos 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.=
com 
  Sent: Tuesday, December 11, 2007 2:46 AM
  Subject: Re: Atlantis - P=
icking Up The Pieces


  OOC: Perseus is waiting for Blacknightmare to answ=
er his question, if she doesn't he is going to have to put her back down in=
to the cell until they get Roddy back to base.



  On Dec 3, 2007 2:09 PM,=
 Kraftlos < kraftlos@...> wrote:

    "Good, then this conversation s=
houldnt take much longer.  Do you wish 
    to join us?  We are a Maximal g=
roup which is opposed to Unicron but
    also opposed to factional fighting=
 among Predicons and Maximals,"
    explained Perseus.  "I dont wish to for=
ce you to fight, we have
    several members who are entirely pasifistic, b=
ut we could use your
    help if you would join us."

    He leaned over mo=
mentairly and spoke breifly into the comm panel, he
    tried to remain cal=
m, but it was aparent that he had received some bad 
    news.

3/07, Airshadow <airly2002@...> wrote:
